subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The former Ohio State coach Jim Tressel was told by the university that he did a poor job of self-reporting N.C.A.A. violations years before he failed to tell his bosses that players were selling memorabilia.
snippet: The former Ohio State coach Jim Tressel was told by the university that he did a poor job of self-reporting N.C.A.A. violations years before he failed to tell his bosses that players were selling memorabilia.
